tool_description: Executes the approved refund transaction and handles payment processing back to customer's original payment method.

refund_type.description: Type of refund: credit_card, store_credit, check, bank_transfer

original_payment_method.description: Original payment method used for purchase

error_messages: Invalid return_id: Return ID must exist and be approved for refund.
Invalid customer_id: Customer ID must match the return request.
Invalid refund_amount: Amount must be positive and not exceed original purchase price.
Invalid refund_type: Type must be one of [credit_card, store_credit, check, bank_transfer].
Payment processing failed: Unable to process refund to original payment method.
Refund limit exceeded: Refund amount exceeds daily processing limits.
usage: Use as final step after all approvals to execute the refund payment. Ensure all prior validations and calculations are complete.

transaction_id.description: Unique transaction ID for the refund

processing_status.description: Current processing status: completed, pending, failed

confirmation_number.description: Customer confirmation number for the refund
